missionPlanner package¶

Submodules¶

missionPlanner.loiterPlanner module¶

class missionPlanner.loiterPlanner.LoiterPlanner(obstacles)¶
plan(waypoints)¶

missionPlanner.mainPlanner module¶

class missionPlanner.mainPlanner.mainPlanner¶

Handles the passing of information for the competition

This class handles passing information between the interop server, the GUI, the path planner, and the various mission planners

convert_boundaries(msg, ref_pos)¶

Converts the boundary points obtained from the interop server to NED coordinates

Parameters:
  • msg (JudgeMission message) – The message received from the interop server
  • ref_pos (list) – The reference latitude, longitude, and height (in m)
Returns:

a list of lists describing all the boundary points each inner list has the North location, East location, and Down location of a single boundary point all measurements are in meters
Return type:

list
convert_obstacles(msg, ref_pos)¶

Converts the obstacles from the rospy message to a list of lists

Parameters:
  • msg (JudgeMission message) – The message received from the interop server
  • ref_pos (list) – The reference latitude, longitude, and height (in m)
Returns:

a list of lists describing all the obstacles each inner list has the North location, East location, Down location, Obstacle height, and Obstacle radius of a single obstacle all measurements are in meters
Return type:

list
convert_waypoints(msg, ref_pos)¶

Converts the waypoints obtained from the interop server to NED coordinates This function doesn’t care about what mission is being run, it just gets the waypoints which can be for the drop location, flight location, or search boundaries, and converts them

Parameters:
  • msg (JudgeMission message) – The message received from the interop server
  • ref_pos (list) – The reference latitude, longitude, and height (in m)
Returns:

a list of lists describing all the waypoints each inner list has the North location, East location, and Down location of a single waypoint all measurements are in meters
Return type:

list
get_server_data(mission_type)¶

Gets data from the interop server

Polls the interop server node via a service call to get the data associated with a specific mission Returns a tuple of all the information

Parameters:mission_type (int) – The mission type number for which data is to be recieved (number defined in the JudgeMission message)
Returns:
  • mission_type (int) – The mission type number for which data was obtained (number defined in the JudgeMission message)
  • obstacles (list of lists) – A list of lists where the inner lists described the N,E,D,r,h orientation of the obstacles
  • boundaries (list of lists) – A list of lists where each inner list describes the NED position of each boundary position
  • waypoints (list of lists) – A list of lists where each inner list describes the NED position of each waypoint associated with the desired mission_type
update_path_callback(msg)¶

This function is called when waypoints are approved by the GUI and adds the waypoints to the approved path. The approved waypoints are sent from the GUI to the path manner via the approve_path message and topic.

update_task_callback(req)¶

This function is called when the desired task is changed by the GUI. The proper mission is then called.

missionPlanner.payloadPlanner module¶

class missionPlanner.payloadPlanner.PayloadPlanner(dropLocation, obstacles, boundaries, wind=[0.0, 0.0, 0.0])¶

inputs: drop gps location, wind, obstacles outputs: X number of waypoints with a single drop waypoint

calcClosedParachuteDrop()¶

Calculates the motion between the commanded relase and the parachute opening

calcCourseCommand()¶

calculates the command course angle to be directly into the wind

calcOpenParachuteDrop()¶

Calculates the motion between the parachute opening and hitting the ground target

calcReleaseLocation(displacement0_1, displacement1_2)¶

calculates desired location for the release command

calcSupportingPoints()¶

given a command release location plot X points for a straight line of deployment run

plan(wind)¶

function called by mainplanner that returns bombdrop waypoint

plot()¶
